title: Local Innovation Hub Launches New STEM Programs
excerpt: The River City Innovation Hub announced a slate of new STEM workshops aimed at middle school students.
author: AventurOO Editorial
body:
Local Innovation Hub Launches New STEM Programs

The River City Innovation Hub announced a slate of new STEM workshops aimed at middle school students.

The programs cover robotics, creative coding, and environmental science with an emphasis on hands-on experimentation.

Organizers say scholarships remain available for students from underserved neighborhoods across the metro area.

title: Community Garden Network Expands to Ten Neighborhoods
excerpt: Volunteers celebrated the opening of five new community gardens that will provide fresh produce and nutrition classes.
author: AventurOO Editorial
body:
Community Garden Network Expands to Ten Neighborhoods

Volunteers celebrated the opening of five new community gardens that will provide fresh produce and nutrition classes.

The expansion brings the total number of neighborhood gardens to ten, supporting more than 1,500 local families.

Upcoming workshops will focus on composting, seed saving, and drought-resistant planting strategies.

title: Downtown Transit Center Adds Weekend Express Service
excerpt: The transit authority introduced weekend express buses linking downtown with major cultural districts.
author: AventurOO Editorial
body:
Downtown Transit Center Adds Weekend Express Service

The transit authority introduced weekend express buses linking downtown with major cultural districts.

The pilot schedule aims to shorten travel times for theater, museum, and stadium visitors throughout the summer.

Ridership data will be reviewed in September before the service is made permanent.
